DOC.brief_summary: This observational study evaluate treatment symptomatic cystocele grade II-III Cousin Biomesh Allium Medical Endofast Reliant . Data 100 patient collect . Follow-up till 3 year procedure . Primary endpoint absence recurrence .
DOC.brief_title: Transvaginal Treatment Symptomatic Cystocele Grade II-III
DOC.criteria: Patient woman Patient 40 90 year old Patient sign inform consent form prior procedure Patient agree schedule followup visit month 1 , month 6 , year 1 , year 2 year 3 Patient symptomatic anterior prolapse Recurrence cystocele Patient pregnant Patient wish become pregnant Patient take Plavix , Sintrom , Marcoumar , Marevan , Brilique , Efient , Ticlid , Xarelto , Eliquis Pradaxa . If intake stop prior procedure , patient allow include . Patient take LMWH dose 40 mg/day Patient life expectancy < 1 year Patient known connective tissue disease Patient history surgery anterior vaginal wall pelvis A scheduled hysterectomy indexprocedure
